thread.title: Men in court accused of murder of British woman in SA
thread.title_full: Men in court accused of murder of British woman in SA

title: Men in court accused of murder of British woman in SA
text: Three men appear in court accused of horrific murder of British woman tortured and shot on her South African farm as it emerges the suspects were on bail for another robbery at the time Sue Howarth, 64, was killed and her husband Robert Lynn, 66, survived Couple were asleep at their farm in South Africa when three men broke in Were attacked with a blowtorch at their remote home, 150 miles from Pretoria The couple were then shot before the thugs dumped their bodies by a roadside Three suspects appeared before magistrates in Belfast, Mpumalanga province
